title: Beyond the Horror: Apocalypse Episode 2
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: has anybody else noticed that there is a Halloween themed episode every season. I personally really like the Halloween episodes because something intense always happens
I'm finding it super, extremely frustrating waiting all week for the show and it seems we get 15 minutes of action and 45 minutes of commercials.

Temptation comes with Langdon as the SNAKE TALKED EVE TO BITE THE APPLE FROM THE TREE OF KNOWLEDGE. Kinda like they get knowledge from the laptop . Then the break the rule OF the house. What if it was rubberman who killed the horses or was from the black horse and can morph.
Oh my God I love this season so far. It's a slow burn mystery and so many things are intentionally being left hidden. It just makes it more interesting.
Warlocks were shown in Coven when they showed young Cordelia.
description:
